snippet: A 9-year-old girl accidentally killed an Arizona shooting instructor as he was showing her how to use an automatic Uzi, authorities said Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Officials: Girl Accidentally Kills Gun Instructor
headline.main: Officials: Girl Accidentally Kills Gun Instructor

lead_paragraph: A 9-year-old girl accidentally killed an Arizona shooting instructor as he was showing her how to use an automatic Uzi, authorities said Tuesday.
